title: Register Client
description: Allows users to add a new client to the CRM system.

title: View Contacts
description: Displays all contact information stored in the system.

title: Dashboard
description: The main analytics and overview page for logged-in users.

title: View Specific Contact
description: Displays detailed information about a specific contact.

title: Edit Contact
description: Allows users to update existing contact information.

title: View Task Logs
description: Displays all background task logs for all users.

title: Create Loan Application
description: Allows users to create a new loan application.

title: Open Loan Calculator
description: Allows users to open the loan calculator.

title: Business Settings
description: Allows users to manage business settings.

title: View specific organisation
description: Displays detailed information about a specific organisation.
